00019     Land factory that loads data from ESM files.

00021   class ESMLandFactory
00022   {

00025 
00026   public:
00027     // Initialize the land factory. Note that refrences to the given
00028     // store and reader are stored in the class, so the given objects
00029     // must be valid for a long as you plan to use this factory.
00030     ESMLandFactory(ESMS::ESMStore &st, ESM::ESMReader &rd)
00031       : store(st), reader(rd) {}
00032 
00033     // True if this factory has any data for the given grid cell.
00034     bool has(int x, int y);
00035 
00036     // Return stream to data for this cell. Additional data about the
00037     // landscape is returned through the LandInfo struct.
00038     LandDataPtr get(int x, int y, LandInfo &info);
00039   };
